allow: Bash(cd /c/source/llmd && node tools/js/llmdc.js corpora/samples/deployment-guide.md -c 2 -o corpora/samples/deployment-guide.llmd 2>&1 && node tools/js/llmdc.js corpora/samples/api-spec.md -c 2 -o corpora/samples/api-spec.llmd 2>&1 && node tools/js/llmdc.js corpora/samples/fluentlm-components.md -c 2 -o corpora/samples/fluentlm-components.llmd 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-gnu 2>&1 && rustup default stable-x86_64-pc-windows-gnu 2>&1)
Bash(which gcc 2>&1 && gcc --version 2>&1 | head -1 && which dlltool 2>&1)
